Posts.Content: My daughter is starting another treatment of carbo;latin and gemzar because abraxane did not reduce the tumor in her liver.  She is stage IV breast cancer with mets to liver, bones, femer, and spine.  All of the cancer is gone except for liver.  She has been battle this since 06/06.06 and I was hoping someone had taken this so we might know what to expect.  Any info would be useful.  Thanks
Posts.Title: Has anyone taken carboplatin and gemzar?
